Nadia Fares Anliker (a mụrụ na 18 Septemba 1962) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede ihe nkiri nke Egypt-Switzerland.

A mụrụ Fares na Bern, Switzerland, nwa nwanyị nke nna Ijipt na nne Switzerland. Ọ mụtara Arabic mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Cairo ruo otu afọ, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cairo n'afọ 1986. N'otu afọ ahụ, Fares duziri ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya, Magic Binoculars, nke mbụ n'ime ọtụtụ mepụtara maka telivishọn Switzerland
Fares malitere ịga Mahadum New York n'afọ 1987 iji mụọ ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1991, o ritere ihe nrite site na Stanley Thomas Johnson Foundation maka obere ihe nkiri ya Sugarblues
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum New York, Krzysztof Kieślowski duziri Fares ma jee ozi dịka osote onye nduzi maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya. O nwetara nzere masta ya na ọmụmụ ihe nkiri n'afọ 1995.
N'afọ 1996, Fares duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Miel et Cendres
Ọ na-agbaso njikọ nke ụmụ nwanyị atọ: dọkịta Naima, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ Amina, na nwa akwụkwọ Leila

Miel et Cendres na-achọpụta njem ha ka ha na-agagharị n'etiti ọdịnala na ọgbara ọhụrụ. Ọ natara onyinye iri na asatọ n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri, gụnyere Oumarou Ganda Prize na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou. Fares duziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na isiokwu nke nsogbu mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka RTS / TV5 Monde.
